name: Paws Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The Paws soundtrack fuses haunting guitar strings with heart wrenching melodies to enhance the melancholy feeling of loss and isolation from the full game.

It includes original music once again composed by Retro Family and also feature reworkings of classic Shelter 1 and Shelter 2 tracks.

We hope you don't mind us taking this opportunity to tell you about our latest game, the Tiny Multiplayer Online RPG Book of Travels!
